title: #210 - Ryan Singer & ME
description:
Comedian Ryan Singer & I hang out the Mancave & talk about his podcast where he smoked DMT w/ Shane Mauss, bad trips vs. good trips naked in rivers on mushrooms, obsess about chewing tobacco &  nicotine in general, and ultimately digress into a wildly sensational conversation about conspiracy theories, aliens, and shape shifting girlfriends.

To get my book "Life of the Party" click HERE: https://www.amazon.com/Life-Party-Stories-Perpetual-Man-Child/dp/1250030250

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com

 

To Follow me on..

Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
